string-array.name: desc
string-array.item: Catchphrase associated with the cartooned Mr. Bean who is hinting an idea of perverse scenario
Rage comic face that is typically used to express one’s approval of an awkward or perverse situation
Image macro series using SMS shorthands and carefree grammar as a way to bring someone’s attention on a particular subject or issue
Rage comic character wearing a mischievous smile that is meant to represent the facial expression of an Internet troll
Exploitable rage comic character that is used to express loneliness and disappointment with life
Internet slang expression used to convey empathy towards or agree with someone else’s feeling or opinion
Rage comic character that often indicates laughter and general amusement
Catchphrase associated with the rage comic character Jet Pack Guy who escapes awkward or difficult situations by flying away with his jet pack
Catchphrase and rage comic character used to convey elegance, wealth and class
Reaction face to convey a dismissive attitude towards someone else’s input in online discussions
